snippet: The nation’s era of deflation appeared to be on the wane as the Nikkei, Consumer Price Index and gross domestic product showed growth in 2013.
abstract: Floyd Norris Off the Charts column says Japan may have turned economic corner; holds that nation's era of deflation appears to be on wane as Nikkei, Consumer Price Index and gross domestic product showed growth in 2013.
lead_paragraph: The nation’s era of deflation appeared to be on the wane as the Nikkei, Consumer Price Index and gross domestic product showed growth in 2013.
